programme.title: Hair
programme.desc: In episode 310, Penn and Teller feather their locks, trim their bangs and set off to explore one of the most ego-challenging subjects of all: hair, and the billion-dollar industry spawned by those who want to change it, shed it, or grow it back(c)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal star in director Ang Lee's acclaimed adaptation of Annie Proulx’s story of the relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years

programme.title: Dead Heat
programme.desc: Well-meaning retired cop Pally (Kiefer Sutherland) is only trying to help out his stepbrother Ray (Anthony LaPaglia) when he agrees to bankroll a long-shot racehorse. But a big-time Mob figure (Daniel Benzali) also has an interest in the animal and before you can say "conflict of interest," Pally and Ray are mired in business with some very shady figures. Lothaire Bluteau and Radha Mitchell costar in this superb crime drama from writer/director Mark Malone ("Dead of Winter," "Hoods")

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: A young schoolgirl (Keke Palmer) from South Central Los Angeles discovers a secret, surprising talent for spelling that promises to take her to the National Spelling Bee, with the help of a depressed English professor (Laurence Fishburne) and despite the opposition of her strict, disciplinarian mother (Angela Bassett). Curtis Armstrong and J.R. Villarreal costar in this critically acclaimed drama

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: Larry has his life turned upside-down when he's saddled with a rookie partner and assigned to investigate an outbreak of mysterious food poisonings at the city's swankiest restaurants. Infuriating restaurateurs with his bad manners, Larry nevertheless manages to charm a sweet, shy waitress into a budding romance. But when unorthodox methods cost him his health inspector job, Larry has to go undercover to bring the conspirators to justice

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: The improbably true story of a charismatic conman's journey from small-town businessman to flamboyant white-collar criminal, who repeatedly finds himself on the lam, brilliantly escaping from prison on four separate occasions - all in the name of love. Starring Jim Carrey, Ewan McGregor and Leslie Mann

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: The Academy Awards® for Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay went to this gritty war drama about a psychologically unglued bomb removal expert plying his trade in Iraq while his crew becomes increasingly unnerved by his cowboy recklessness. Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie and Brian Geraghty star in this acclaimed, tension-filled journey into the heart of darkness

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: Sam (Chris Pine) is a twenty-something, fast-talking salesman whose latest deal collapses the day he learns his father has suddenly died. Against his wishes, Sam is called home to put his father's estate in order and reconnect with his estranged family. While there, he uncovers a startling secret that turns his entire world upside down - he has a 30-year-old sister (Elizabeth Banks) he never knew existed. Michelle Pfeiffer and Oliva Wilde co-star in this smart and witty drama

programme.title: Amsterdam
programme.desc: Marty and The Pod are sent to Phoenix to clean up a mess at a very powerful sports franchise caused by the impending divorce of its high-powered owners. Jeannie takes a dinner meeting with Derek, an old flame, but is deflated when she finds out his real intentions toward her. On the home front, Marty continues his personal war with Principal Gita over Roscoe's cross-dressing(c)

programme.title: Microphallus
programme.desc: Marty arrives at the offices to find Greg Norbert there to announce the possible acquisition of Galweather by MetroCapital; the Pod flies to Indiana to consult for a beverage company, where Marty applies his management skills to turn a loss into a win; Clyde questions whether Doug really hooked up with a transvestite; Roscoe struggles with the confusing feelings of liking both a boy and a girl(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Mini-Mogul

Meanwhile, Jeannie reacts to her recent engagement by having a tryst with Kurt, a tortured musician she randomly meets in a coffee house(c)

programme.title: Utah

programme.title: Bareback Town

programme.title: Veritas

programme.title: Prologue And Aftermath
programme.desc: Jeannie embarks on a gig to establish her own legend in the consulting world when she leads the Pod to her hometown on a mission to resurrect an ailing church; Marty enters into custody mediation with Monica but her powers of manipulation are in full force, threatening Marty's relationship with April(n)

programme.title: Business

programme.desc: In a town where nothing is as it seems - and everyone has something to hide - this prequel to the television drama series chronicles the seven days leading up to the brutal murder of Laura Palmer in a small logging town in the Pacific Northwest. programme.desc: Rob Schneider stars as an average aquarium cleaner who house-sits for a gigolo - only to be forced to become one himself(n)

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: Documentary glimpse into a very broken criminal justice system as nearly 16 years after his confession exonerated a death row inmate and sparked the end of the death penalty in Illinois, Alstory Simon languishes in prison serving a 37-year sentence over a confession he claims was coerced(n)

programme.title: F/X
programme.desc: Bryan Brown stars as a special-effects expert for low-budget Hollywood movies who his hired to fake the assassination of a gangster who wants to avoid testifying against his former mob bosses. Co-stars Jerry Orbach and Brian Dennehy(n)

programme.title: F/X 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the 80s thriller, Bryan Brown stars as a special-effects expert who is enlisted to help trap a would-be killer. Co-stars Brian Dennehy(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an ATF agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber - but finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims. Denzel Washington stars(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Denzel Washington stars as Rubin "Hurricane" Carter -- a man whose dreams of winning the middleweight boxing title are destroyed when he is wrongly accused of killing three people in a New Jersey bar. Years later, in jail, a young man begins an impassioned and moving fight to prove Hurricane's innocence. Also stars Liev Schreiber(n)

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)(n)

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an ATF agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber - but finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims. Denzel Washington stars(n)

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Hidden In America
programme.desc: When a factory worker and recently widowed father (Beau Bridges) is laid off, he sacrifices his family's welfare for the sake of pride. However, a concerned doctor (Bruce Davison) tries to intervene. Jeff Bridges and Frances McDormand costar in this drama

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Tears and Tortillas
programme.desc: A Mexican grandmother is miraculously reunited with a long-lost love while making tortillas in this charming short from filmmaker Xochitl Dorsey

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Jesus Town, U.S.A.
programme.desc: Comedic documentary about a small Oklahoma town and their ambitious yearly theatrical endeavor: staging the passion play with over 100 cast members to the backdrop of a bizarre reproduction of Jerusalem built in the foothills of the Wichita mountains. Despite being an 88-year-old tradition, the play is struggling to find an audience and the young man who plays the role of Jesus has a secret revelation that could change everything

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: Blue Crush 2
programme.desc: In this adventure surf film a young woman, haunted by the memory of her deceased mother, leaves Malibu behind and heads to the breathtaking coast of South Africa on a quest to fulfill a surfing dream, with nothing but her mom's journal as a guide and a fun-loving group of surf fanatics cheering her on

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Blue Crush

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: A young schoolgirl (Keke Palmer) from South Central Los Angeles discovers a secret, surprising talent for spelling that promises to take her to the National Spelling Bee, with the help of a depressed English professor (Laurence Fishburne) and despite the opposition of her strict, disciplinarian mother (Angela Bassett). Curtis Armstrong and J.R. Villarreal costar in this critically acclaimed drama

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: Richard Farnsworth and Sissy Spacek star in director David Lynch's tale of Alvin Straight, an elderly man who makes a long journey by lawn mower to mend a relationship with his estranged brother

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and costars in this box office smash about a divorcee (Kimberly Elise) who learns to trust and love again after a nasty break up with her arrogant and emotionally distant attorney husband, thanks to comically sage advice from her sassy grandmother Madea. Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay(n)

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama(n)

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time(n)

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the Frog - along with Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Gonzo and a motley crew of Muppets - embarks on a cross-country trip to find fame in Hollywood while eluding the grasp of a relentless frog-leg restauranteur(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect(n)

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the Frog - along with Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Gonzo and a motley crew of Muppets - embarks on a cross-country trip to find fame in Hollywood while eluding the grasp of a relentless frog-leg restauranteur(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa

Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise

programme.title: Beat
programme.desc: Kiefer Sutherland stars as writer William S. Burroughs in this biopic set in the early days of the Beat literary movement in New York City. As Burroughs courts the woman who would become his second wife, the pair are drawn into the lives of poets Jack Kerouac and Allen Ginsberg and their world of sex, violence and unbridled creativity. Costars Courtney Love

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: Psychological drama from director Atom Egoyan ("The Sweet Hereafter") stars Elaine Cassidy as Felicia, an Irish girl who follows her boyfriend to England when she discovers she's pregnant with his child. Unsure of his exact whereabouts, Felicia instead comes under the sway of Joseph (Bob Hoskins), a caterer who has a violent secret history with young homeless women just like Felicia. Based on the novel by William Trevor

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Secrets Kept
programme.desc: A man returns to his childhood church hoping to rid himself of a long-held secret in this short from filmmaker Charles Nuckolls

programme.title: Knock Knock, It's Tig Notaro
programme.desc: Documentary that follows deadpan comedian Tig Notaro across the country as she puts on a series of stand-up performances in the homes, backyards, barns and basements of her most loyal fans, with each intimate show offering the potential for epiphany or disaster

programme.title: Red Corner
programme.desc: Richard Gere stars as a hotshot entertainment lawyer who travels to China for business and has a one-night stand with a young Chinese woman, then wakes to find that she has been murdered and he has been framed with the crime

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: At a time when crimes of passion result in celebrity headlines, nightclub sensation Velma Kelly (Catherine Zeta-Jones) and spotlight seeking Roxie Hart (Renee Zellweger) both find themselves sharing space on Chicago's famed Murderess Row. They also share Billy Flynn (Richard Gere), the town's slickest lawyer with a talent for turning notorious defendants into local legends. Winner of 6 Academy Awards®

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: In this dark thriller, a fugitive IRA soldier promises to protect the lover of the British soldier he was holding hostage, and when he seeks her out in London, they both have dangerous secrets they're unwilling to reveal. Stars Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Good Advice
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars as a successful stockbroker who, after losing his fortune on a bad stock tip, decides to secretly write into his ex-girlfriend's less-than-successful advice column, setting of a romantic chain of events. Also stars Denise Richards and Rosanna Arquette

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Hiding out from the police, a thief meets a bedridden senior citizen who begs him to end her life in this short from filmmaker Oscar Daniels

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: At the peak of her international career, film star Maria Enders (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself while starring in a revival of the play that made her famous twenty years ago. Co-starring Kristen Stewart and Chloë Grace Moretz

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart stars as a master dance teacher and choreographer with a lifetime of memories, who is interviewed by a young couple and unexpectedly forced to confront the painful decisions he thought he left in the past

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt

programme.title: Man About Town (2006)
programme.desc: The life of an unscrupulous Hollywood talent agent (Ben Affleck) comes unraveled when he learns that his beautiful wife has been having an affair with his top client, then loses his highly detailed and personal journal to an ambitious reporter. Rebecca Romijn, Bai Ling and John Cleese costar in this comedy-drama from writer/director Mike Binder ("Reign Over Me")

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett(n)

programme.title: Strip Club Slayer
programme.desc: When a strip club goer is killed, the dancers hire a bouncer to protect themselves. As the sexual tension grows between one of the women and the bouncer, the mystery of the dangerous killer unravels(n)

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A handsome Don Juan finds his life a living nightmare in Alejandro Amenabar's intriguing Spanish genre-bender, which mixes science fiction, horror and psychological thriller. No sooner has Cesar (Eduardo Noriega) met the woman of his dreams (Peneope Cruz), than a jilted ex (Najwa Nimri) decides to wreak her revenge. Alas, that's only the beginning of Cesar's problems. Be prepared for a wild and twisty ride in this sexy and challenging philosophical puzzlebox. Later remade as "Vanilla Sky," in which Cruz reprised her costarring role(n)

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase(n)

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller(n)

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse(n)

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City(n)

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman(n)

programme.title: Daughters of the Dust
programme.desc: Ensemble drama set in 1902 about a community of descendants of West African slaves living on an island off of South Carolina. The story revolves around a picnic celebrating a few former islanders who chose to move north

programme.title: The Learning Tree
programme.desc: Gordon Parks' adaptation of his own novel about a black teenager living in 1920s Kansas. After witnessing a murder, he must decide if he should come forward to clear the man being framed for the crime

programme.title: Losing Ground
programme.desc: An educated woman takes a journey of self-fulfillment after reaching the breaking point over her narcissistic husband's dalliances

programme.title: Symbiopsychotaxiplasm Take One
programme.desc: In this part-fiction, part-documentary work, a director auditions acting students for a fictional drama, while simultaneously shooting the behind-the-scenes action taking place

programme.title: Symbol of the Unconquered
programme.desc: A black woman encounters racial prejudice when she goes West to claim a mine that she's inherited

programme.title: Go Down Death
programme.desc: Religious yarn centering on a minister with a tarnished reputation. Myra D. Hemmings, Samuel H. James, Eddye L. Houston, Spencer Williams, Amos Droughan, Walter McMillion, Irene Campbell, Charlie Washington

programme.title: MGM Parade
programme.desc: Walter Pidgeon discusses his role in "Forbidden Planet" and introduces clips from "Captains Courageous

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: W. Somerset Maugham's tale of Sadie Thompson, a South Seas floozy who falls prey to a hell-and-brimstone reformer wishing to save the soul of the "lost woman," while being romanced by a lovelorn U.S. soldier

programme.title: Grand Hotel
programme.desc: This Best Picture winner charts 24 hours in the lives of guests at a plush Berlin hostelry, where a down-on-his-luck thief covets a ballerina's pearls, while lusting after the mistress of a businessman whose dying bookkeeper is tended by a drunken doctor

programme.title: The Last of Mrs. Cheyney

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: T.I. helps his uncle check items off his bucket list. Later, someone begins pranking everyone in the household. (repeat)

programme.title: T.I. and Tiny: The Family Hustle
programme.desc: Tiny sees a medium to gain closure with the recent death of her nephew. Later, T.I. devises a plan to scare his oldest sons into paying more attention to their younger siblings. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part 1 of two. Vanessa (Brooklyn Sudano) is more than a little bit pregnant. In fact, she's a week overdue. She wants a natural childbirth at home, presided over by a new-agey midwife named Summer Breeze (Kelly Coffield). Fat chance of that happening. Meanwhile, Claire suspects Kady of pilfering her perfume and lipstick. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Conclusion. Following Vanessa's false labor (and the chaos it caused), Michael scripts a “game plan” for the real thing. “This has to work like clockwork,” he declares. Meanwhile, Claire and Kady, having made up, go off on a shopping spree together. Vanessa: Brooklyn Sudano. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Part 1. Michael is obsessed with the prospect of going one-on-one with Michael Jordan at a Las Vegas basketball fantasy camp. Wayne Newton has a cameo in the episode, in which the entire Kyle klan joins Michael in Vegas. Slobodan: Nick Von Esmarch. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael goes one-on-one with Michael Jordan in the conclusion of a two-part visit to Las Vegas. Rev. Al Sharpton also has a cameo as a minister at an all-night wedding chapel; Alan Thicke plays a magician who makes Jr. disappear (but can't bring him back); and Dom Irrera plays a hotel waiter whom Michael tips (exorbitantly) to show him Jordan's suite. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Phil and Mouse take Jamie to a club to help him get over losing his job and his girlfriend, but Jamie's pickup lines fall flat with the ladies. Then he meets a woman named Nancy, who seems to have much in common with Fancy. Nancy: Golden Brooks. Phil: Alex Thomas. Mouse: Suli McCullough. Helen: Ellia English. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.sub-title: Serve No Wine Before I Get Mine
programme.desc: After a series of low-paying gigs, Jamie gets a break and records one of his original songs for a record producer, but the arrangement might not be as legitimate as the singer thinks. Clive: Darryl Sivad. Lucien: Ed Lover. Babyhair: Darrel Heath. Helen: Ellia English. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: A lonely Jamie spends the night with Fancy at her apartment, but the morning after proves awkward for the former couple. The tension increases later that night when Jamie sees Fancy with another man at a party. Brandon: Billy Kane. Barbara: Devika Parikh. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Phil: Alex Thomas. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. (repeat)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Jamie refuses to sign with a record company and instead tries to sell compact discs of his original music over the Internet, which leads to a “Matrix” fantasy with Garcelle Beauvais (Fancy) and Christopher B. Duncan (Braxton) appearing as characters from the film. Helen: Ellia English. Mouse: Suli McCullough. Phil: Alex Thomas. (repeat)

programme.desc: A web of deceit surrounds a college party that Will attends---and where Ashley is found with a football player. Tina: Cee Cee Harshaw. Jana: Ajai Sanders. Lisa: Nia Long. Ashley: Tatyana M. Ali. Bennie: J. Lamont Pope. Michel: Louis R. Plante. (repeat)

programme.desc: A planned camping trip is cut short for Carlton and Will when a robber approaches them---and fires a gun. Vy: Vernee Watson-Johnson. Lisa: Nia Long. Nurse Avner: Beverly Jackson. Nurse Upton: Nita Whitaker. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air

programme.desc: Znakomite pasmo, w którym każdy usłyszy coś, co lubi najbardziej. Widzowie dostaną z rana same smakowite muzyczne rarytasy

programme.title: Muzyczny rytm dnia
programme.desc: Wyjątkowe zestawienie przebojów, które dzięki swojej energii nadadzą widzom odpowiedni rytm dnia. Ta muzyka jest rytmem ich pulsu

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Gotować każdy może... z Rachel Allen
programme.sub-title: Gotować każdy może... z Rachel Allen (odc. 12)
programme.desc: Znawczyni kulinariów Rachel Allen wraca do Irlandii, w swoje rodzinne strony, by zaprezentować widzom proste i smaczne posiłki, które można serwować w gronie najbliższych. Wszystkie proponowane przepisy Allen realizuje w swoim domu w Ballymaloe, gdzie narodziła się jej pasja gotowania, dzięki czemu widzowie mają niepowtarzalną okazję, by poznać rodzinę i przyjaciół prowadzącej, a także jej codzienne rytuały i kulinarne zwyczaje. Za sprawą przysmaków ze słonecznej Italii Rachel wyczaruje dziś w swojej kuchni atmosferę włoskiej restauracji. Zestaw dań składa się z sałatki z szynką parmeńską, risotto z grzybami i tiramisu

programme.title: Taka sytuacja
programme.desc: Twórcy programu dzielą się poradami dotyczącymi dnia codziennego. Omawiają rozmaite życiowe problemy, prezentując zabawne i pouczające nagrania. Rozmawiają też z znanymi gośćmi o ich sposobach radzenia sobie z wyzwaniami i wpadkami. Każdy odcinek to spora dawka śmiechu, lecz także porcja ciekawostek ze świata nauki. Dzięki programowi widzowie dowiedzą się, jak nie dać się oszukać przy wynajmie mieszkania czy zakupie używanego auta, jak zrobić wrażenie na przyszłym pracodawcy. Poznają też niezastąpione metody na uciążliwego sąsiada, dowiedzą się też, dlaczego nie należy zamawiać spaghetti na pierwszej randce. Wśród gości, którzy podzielą się swoimi zabawnymi doświadczeniami znajdą się Krzysztof Skiba, Grażyna Wolszczak czy Zygmunt Chajzer czy Joanna Koroniewska

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie ekspertki stylu Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine podróżują po całym świecie, pomagając zaniedbanym kobietom przeobrazić się w ikony stylu. Bardzo bezpośrednie i nieowijające w bawełnę guru kobiecej mody uczą panie, jak dobrze wyglądać. Ich misją jest wpojenie zasad dobrego stylu i rozsądnego podążania za modą. W tej serii Trinny i Susannah oceniają styl Norweżek. W każdym odcinku spotykają się z kobietami o różnych modowych upodobaniach oraz gustach. Doradzają im oraz pomagają dobrać buty, dodatki, stroje odpowiednie dla ich sylwetki, typu urody i stylu życia. Specjalistki współpracują z doskonałymi fryzjerami, wizażystami i projektantami, by uzyskać piorunujący efekt i zmienić zwykłe kobiety w niezwykłe modelki. Ich zawodowe motto to: "Absolutnie każdy może wyglądać fantastycznie! Trzeba tylko wiedzieć, jak się nie ubierać"

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem
programme.desc: Kobieta za kierownicą stała się bohaterką wielu dowcipów, a w brzydkiej części użytkowników dróg w najlepszym wypadku budzi uśmiech politowania. W programie panie, które niezbyt dobrze radzą sobie z prowadzeniem auta zasiądą na miejscu kierowcy. Pasażerami, a jednocześnie instruktorami będą... ich partnerzy. Każda para będzie miała trzy dni na uzupełnienie braków i dogłębne poznanie techniki jazdy samochodem. Nie zawsze będzie różowo - widzowie będą świadkami wybuchów złości, łez porażki i słownych potyczek. Trudy nauki wydobędą bowiem z bohaterów prawdziwe uczucia, które żywią oni swoich połówek. Ale na tym nie koniec. Każda para przejdzie dodatkowo test końcowy. Uczestnicy, którzy najlepiej poradzą sobie z zadaniem wyjadą z programu z atrakcyjną nagrodą. Emocji na pewno nie zabraknie

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Modelka Deb Dobson ginie w wypadku samochodowym i jako duch powraca na ziemię w ciele błyskotliwie inteligentnej, wziętej prawniczki Jane Bingum. Pod nową postacią dwie osobowości kobiety muszą nauczyć się koegzystować. Dla Deb, której świat koncentrował się wokół nieskazitelnego wyglądu, zmiana jest prawdziwym szokiem. Stopniowo jednak przejmuje sposób bycia swojego nowego "puszystego" wcielenia. Jane bierze udział w procesie, w którym po przeciwnych stronach stoją niedoszli państwo młodzi. Kim i Grayson reprezentują surogatkę poszukującą rodziców zastępczych mającego przyjść na świat dziecka

programme.title: Detektyw Cain
programme.desc: Bezkompromisowy i cyniczny kapitan Fred Cain (Bruno Debrandt) pracuje w wydziale zabójstw. Przed pięcioma laty uległ tragicznemu wypadkowi. Od tej pory porusza się na wózku inwalidzkim. Śledczy znany jest z nietypowych metod działania. Niezwykła intuicja sprawia, że z łatwością odgaduje słabości innych. Niekiedy też zdarza się mu łamać obowiązujące procedury. Jego zawodową partnerką jest detektyw Lucie Delambre (Julie Delarme). W życiu prywatnym Caine próbuje uporać się z rozwodem. Kłopotów przysparza mu również dorastający syn, Ben (Davy Sanna)

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju i ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw informacji, które mają lub mogą mieć wpływ na ich życie. Najważniejszy punkt odniesienia w serwisie stanowi człowiek. Reporterzy skupiają się głównie na tematach, których brakuje obecnie w serwisach informacyjnych. Program przygotowują znani dziennikarze, m.in. Beata Tadla, Joanna Dunikowska, Marek Czyż, Jarosław Kulczycki i Tomasz Sekielski

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny

programme.title: Nowa Rewia Kabaretowa
programme.desc: W programie wystąpią najlepsi rodzimi specjaliści od dobrego humoru, m.in. Formacja Chatelet, Łowcy.B, Koń Polski, Kabaret pod Wyrwigroszem, Elita, Kabaret Skeczów Męczących i grupa Nowaki. Pojawią się liczni goście, a także sceniczne osobowości - Krzysztof Piasecki, Tomasz Jachimek, Jerzy Kryszak, Katarzyna Pakosińska i Andrzej Grabowski. Jerzy Kryszak to jeden z najbardziej rozpoznawalnych komików. Słynie z umiejętności parodiowania znanych osób. Jego występy to świetna zabawa, a jednocześnie błyskotliwy komentarz rzeczywistości

programme.title: Party Mix
programme.desc: Weekendowe pasmo muzyczne, w którym jego twórcy zaprezentują starannie wyselekcjonowany zbiór utworów w sam raz na taneczny, imprezowy wieczór. Widzowie usłyszą przeboje, które cieszą się największą popularnością w różnych częściach świata. Nie zabraknie najsłynniejszych hitów artystów polskich i gwiazd z zagranicy

programme.title: 100 złotych
programme.desc: Zestawienie klipów, które w ciągu ostatnich kilku lat najbardziej namieszały w show biznesie. Zaproszeni do studia goście komentują zaprezentowane w rankingu utwory. Program jest dynamicznie zmontowany, a widz czasami ma wrażenie, że goście prowadzą ze sobą dialog. Ich wypowiedzi przeplatane są fragmentami piosenek. Klipy są także prezentowane jako tło blueboxowe bądź jako element scenografii

W tej serii Trinny i Susannah oceniają styl Norweżek. W każdym odcinku spotykają się z kobietami o różnych modowych upodobaniach oraz gustach. Doradzają im oraz pomagają dobrać buty, dodatki, stroje odpowiednie dla ich sylwetki, typu urody i stylu życia. Specjalistki współpracują z doskonałymi fryzjerami, wizażystami i projektantami, by uzyskać piorunujący efekt i zmienić zwykłe kobiety w niezwykłe modelki. Ich zawodowe motto to: "Absolutnie każdy może wyglądać fantastycznie! Trzeba tylko wiedzieć, jak się nie ubierać"

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem
programme.desc: Kobieta za kierownicą stała się bohaterką wielu dowcipów, a w brzydkiej części użytkowników dróg w najlepszym wypadku budzi uśmiech politowania. W programie panie, które niezbyt dobrze radzą sobie z prowadzeniem auta zasiądą na miejscu kierowcy. Pasażerami, a jednocześnie instruktorami będą... ich partnerzy. Każda para będzie miała trzy dni na uzupełnienie braków i dogłębne poznanie techniki jazdy samochodem. Nie zawsze będzie różowo - widzowie będą świadkami wybuchów złości, łez porażki i słownych potyczek. Trudy nauki wydobędą bowiem z bohaterów prawdziwe uczucia, które żywią oni swoich połówek. Ale na tym nie koniec. Każda para przejdzie dodatkowo test końcowy. Uczestnicy, którzy najlepiej poradzą sobie z zadaniem wyjadą z programu z atrakcyjną nagrodą. Emocji na pewno nie zabraknie

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Modelka Deb Dobson ginie w wypadku samochodowym i jako duch powraca na ziemię w ciele błyskotliwie inteligentnej, wziętej prawniczki Jane Bingum. Pod nową postacią dwie osobowości kobiety muszą nauczyć się koegzystować. Dla Deb, której świat koncentrował się wokół nieskazitelnego wyglądu, zmiana jest prawdziwym szokiem. Stopniowo jednak przejmuje sposób bycia swojego nowego "puszystego" wcielenia. Jane bierze udział w procesie, w którym po przeciwnych stronach stoją niedoszli państwo młodzi. Kim i Grayson reprezentują surogatkę poszukującą rodziców zastępczych mającego przyjść na świat dziecka

programme.title: Detektyw Cain
programme.desc: Bezkompromisowy i cyniczny kapitan Fred Cain (Bruno Debrandt) pracuje w wydziale zabójstw. Przed pięcioma laty uległ tragicznemu wypadkowi. Od tej pory porusza się na wózku inwalidzkim. Śledczy znany jest z nietypowych metod działania. Niezwykła intuicja sprawia, że z łatwością odgaduje słabości innych. Niekiedy też zdarza się mu łamać obowiązujące procedury. Jego zawodową partnerką jest detektyw Lucie Delambre (Julie Delarme). W życiu prywatnym Caine próbuje uporać się z rozwodem. Kłopotów przysparza mu również dorastający syn, Ben (Davy Sanna)

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju i ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw informacji, które mają lub mogą mieć wpływ na ich życie. Najważniejszy punkt odniesienia w serwisie stanowi człowiek. Reporterzy skupiają się głównie na tematach, których brakuje obecnie w serwisach informacyjnych. Program przygotowują znani dziennikarze, m.in. Beata Tadla, Joanna Dunikowska, Marek Czyż, Jarosław Kulczycki i Tomasz Sekielski

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny

programme.title: Nowa Rewia Kabaretowa
programme.desc: W programie wystąpią najlepsi rodzimi specjaliści od dobrego humoru, m.in. Formacja Chatelet, Łowcy.B, Koń Polski, Kabaret pod Wyrwigroszem, Elita, Kabaret Skeczów Męczących i grupa Nowaki. Pojawią się liczni goście, a także sceniczne osobowości - Krzysztof Piasecki, Tomasz Jachimek, Jerzy Kryszak, Katarzyna Pakosińska i Andrzej Grabowski. Jerzy Kryszak to jeden z najbardziej rozpoznawalnych komików. Słynie z umiejętności parodiowania znanych osób. Jego występy to świetna zabawa, a jednocześnie błyskotliwy komentarz rzeczywistości

programme.title: Party Mix
programme.desc: Weekendowe pasmo muzyczne, w którym jego twórcy zaprezentują starannie wyselekcjonowany zbiór utworów w sam raz na taneczny, imprezowy wieczór. Widzowie usłyszą przeboje, które cieszą się największą popularnością w różnych częściach świata. Nie zabraknie najsłynniejszych hitów artystów polskich i gwiazd z zagranicy

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: Teenage identical twins who were unknowingly separated at an early age meet for the first time at summer camp where they scheme to change places and return home to their unwitting parents in hopes of reuniting them. Hayley Mills plays twins Susan and Sharon

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Giant Poking Device
programme.desc: Joey reveals to Chandler that he saw Janice kissing her estranged husband; Rachel and Monica baby-sit Ben; Phoebe explains her fear of the dentist. Janice: Maggie Wheeler. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. Monica: Courteney Cox. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: A drunken Chandler has a liaison with one of Joey's sisters; a nice guy recommends Rachel for a job. Mark: Steven Eckholdt. Cookie: Alex Meneses. Nonna: Penny Santon. Mary Angela: Holly Gagnier. Mary Therese: Mimi Lieber. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Jealousy
programme.desc: Ross is jealous of Mark; a romantic poet criticizes Monica in verse; Joey's a dancing fool for a Broadway musical audition. Mark: Steven Eckholdt. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. Ross: David Schwimmer. (repeat)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Monica and Richard Are Just Friends
programme.desc: Monica sees Richard (Tom Selleck) again and they agree to be just pals---and occasional lovers; Phoebe's new beau has an embarrassing habit. Robert: Markus Flanagan. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will proves to be just what a black fraternity wants, but Carlton strikes them as a "prep-school...sellout." Top Dog: Glenn Plummer. Orlando: Mushond Lee. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. Will: Will Smith. Philip: James Avery. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will breaks a date with Jackie to accompany Hilary to a Playboy reception for "weather girls." Hugh Hefner appears. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Philip: James Avery. Will: Will Smith. Vivian: Daphne Maxwell Reid. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Heart Attack Is
programme.desc: Philip (James Avery) has a heart attack after Will sneaks him high-fat foods. Dr. Kevarkian: Dominic Hoffman. Paramedic: Darryl Sivad. Will: Will Smith. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. (repeat)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will's scheme to improve his grades by fixing up his professor (Phil Morris) with Hilary backfires when Hilary finds fault with the man. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Rhetta: Rachel True. Jackie: Tyra. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock returns as “Accident” Amy, who used to go with Benny's fiancé, Randy--- and wants to again. Randy: Nick Offerman. Gina: Elmarie Wendel. Jack: Jack Blessing. Benny: Belita Moreno. Ernie: Valente Rodriguez. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: After a tantrum at work and a slug at a teasing co-worker, the recently dumped Benny is the top suspect when the factory is vandalized. Zack: Trevor Wright. Mel: Mark Tymchyshyn. Big Bob: Harley Zumbrum. Gina: Elmarie Wendel. Benny: Belita Moreno. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: After dumping bad-boy Zack, Carmen quickly finds a new boyfriend, but George just as quickly finds a problem with the boy. Noah: Johnny Pacar. Zack: Trevor Wright. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Benny: Belita Moreno. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: Now George Noah Ex-Zack-Ly What Happened
programme.desc: George gives Carmen an ultimatum regarding Zack; Randy tries to win back Benny with help from the Commodores. Zack: Trevor Wright. Mel: Mark Tymchyshyn. Randy: Nick Offerman. Officer: Steven Montfort. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Benny: Belita Moreno. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: George Searches for a Needle in a Haight-Stack
programme.desc: Chingy and Carrot Top appear as George gets a lead on Carmen's location from the guy who took her there. Zack: Trevor Wright. Vic: Emiliano Diez. Mel: Mark Tymchyshyn. Bouncer: Marcus Brown. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Benny: Belita Moreno. Max: Luis Armand Garcia. (repeat)

programme.title: Pair of Kings

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: When Vanessa asks Doof to babysit her pet bat, Doof has to overcome his life-long fear of them

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The duo build a solar system and race planets. Candace believes she can multi-task but ends up making a mess of the house. Doof hosts a motivational seminar

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace's mother refuses to replace her latest lost phone, so she is forced to ask Phineas and Ferb for help

programme.desc: The boys are inspired by their father to make a magic carpet

programme.desc: The boys go back in time to the stone age, where they end up inventing the wheel

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb

programme.desc: The gang journeys into an area unchanged since prehistoric times after a pterodactyl flies off with Waddles

programme.desc: The end of year exams are looming and Maud's annoyed that distracted Mildred isn't taking revision seriously. Miss Cackle goes to the cottage in the woods to learn Agatha has escaped. Ethel is desperate to find out the secret, so she does an impersonation spell to transform into Maud, hoping Mildred will open up to her. Mildred and Enid work out Ethel's plan and tell 'Maud' that the big secret is that Mildred is Miss Cackle's niece. Miss Cackle is annoyed and grounds the two of them. Mildred thinks Miss Cackle isn't herself and worries Agatha had returned from the cottage so she flies to Agatha's cottage in the woods. She meets Agatha and Gullet at the cottage and they try to take her powers, but she escapes. Ethel finds the birth scroll just as Miss Gullet and Agatha arrive at the castle. Esmerelda unwittingly invites them in, thinking Agatha is Miss Cackle, and gives up her powers - only to learn she's given them to the wrong sister. Agatha announces to the school that she is in charge. When Mildred finally arrives back at the castle, she's greeted by Maud and Miss Hardbroom who expels her

programme.title: Little Roy
programme.desc: There's a storm brewing outside and it's making everyone jumpy. Roy tries to help with the snacks for Becky's movie night but a loud rumble of thunder makes him leap and sprawl across the ceiling! Bill and Maura explain that it's normal to be afraid of the storm and that they're perfectly safe, but when the lights go out, Roy whirls into a cartoon panic! He wonders what Wonder Roy would do? Wonder Roy and Finn discover Nighty Knight has cut the power to Toonville and is using his giant shadow to scare the inhabitants. The dynamic duo quickly reveal his trick and send him on his way. Back in reality, Roy is inspired to generate a cartoon light-bulb to keep the dark at bay. Then, when Becky's movie night is cancelled, Roy uses his stretchy skills to entertain everyone with a shadow puppet show. Even when the lights come back on, everyone agrees that they don't need a movie night - Roy is the only entertainment they need!
